sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-form class="form" @submit="onSubmit" @reset="onReset" v-if="show">
    <b-form-group>
      <b-form-input
        class="input-field"
        id="firstName"
        v-model="form.firstName"
        required
        placeholder="Ime"
      ></b-form-input>
    </b-form-group>

    <b-form-group>
      <b-form-input
        class="input-field"
        id="lastName"
        v-model="form.lastName"
        required
        placeholder="Priimek"
      ></b-form-input>
    </b-form-group>

    <b-form-group>
      <b-form-input
        class="input-field"
        id="title"
        v-model="form.title"
        required
        placeholder="Naslov"
      ></b-form-input>
    </b-form-group>

    <b-form-group>
      <b-form-textarea
        class="input-field"
        id="content"
        v-model="form.content"
        required
        rows=8
        placeholder="Zakaj ste primerni za izbrano delo?"
      ></b-form-textarea>
    </b-form-group>

    <b-button type="submit" variant="primary">Oddaj</b-button>  
    <b-button type="reset" variant="danger">Poƒçisti</b-button>
  </b-form>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    name: 'WorkApplication',
    data() {
      return {
        form: {
          firstName: '',
          lastName: '',
          title: '',
          content: '',
        },
        show: true
      }
    },
    methods: {
      onSubmit(evt) {
        evt.preventDefault()
        alert(JSON.stringify(this.form))
      },
      onReset(evt) {
        evt.preventDefault()
        // Reset our form values
        this.form.firstName = ''
        this.form.lastName = ''
        this.form.title = ''
        this.form.content = ''
        // Trick to reset/clear native browser form validation state
        this.show = false
        this.$nextTick(() => {
          this.show = true
        })
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
  .input-field {
    margin: 10px 0;
  }
</style>
